mapper.select: select * from sys_banner where valid = '1' limit 0, ${page}
SELECT columnName as tabName,columnId as tabType FROM sys_column where isAllow = 'Y'

select wznm, CONCAT('/articlefile', thumb) as articleImg, articleTitle as articleTitle, CONCAT('/blog/detail/', wznm) as articleUrl, abstracts as articleDec, (select nickname from m_user where yhnm = t.createBy and valid = '1') as releasePeople, DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as releaseTime from sys_article t where columnId = #{articleType} order by createTime desc limit 0, ${page}

SELECT wznm, CONCAT('/articlefile', thumb) as articleImg, articleTitle as articleTitle, CONCAT('/blog/detail/', wznm) as articleUrl, abstracts as articleDec, (select nickname from m_user where yhnm = t.createBy and valid = '1') as releasePeople, DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as releaseTime, hits, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM sys_comment WHERE wznm = t.wznm ) AS postNum, (select columnName from sys_column where columnId = t.columnId) as articleForm FROM sys_article t where articleStatus = '2' order by createTime desc limit 0, ${page}
